events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it does not fit properly, and I would like to request a refund.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's mention of wanting money back.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah L. in the refunds department for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm Sarah and I'll assist you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has been returned or if you need instructions on how to do so?
My order number is 123456789, and I haven't returned the jacket yet. Please provide the return procedure so I can send it back.
Thank you for the details. Please use the prepaid return label we emailed you to send the jacket back. Once we receive it, a full refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the jacket back tomorrow.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. Please check your bank account for the credited amount.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Closing this refund case now. Please reach out again if you need further help.
